aboutusintro.title: About Jyoti Precision
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering Since 2005
aboutusintro.description: Founded in 2005, Jyoti Precision has established itself as a leading manufacturer of high-precision brass components. We specialize in serving the automotive and pneumatic sectors, delivering exceptional quality and reliability through advanced manufacturing technologies and a commitment to engineering excellence.

items.name: Rajesh Kumar
items.content: Jyoti Precision has been our go-to partner for precision components. Their quality and reliability are unmatched in the industry.

items.name: Samantha Wright
items.content: The technical expertise and consistent quality of Jyoti Precision's components have significantly improved our product performance.
